name: colorsortedimagegrid
description: Given a folder of images, sorts the images by color, then outputs the color-sorted image into one NxM image grid.

scripts.test: node index.js -i .\images\test\ --visualizationMode normal && node index.js -i .\images\test\ --visualizationMode 4x4 && node index.js -i .\images\test\ --visualizationMode dominant

author: Zach Fox
